code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./FilmList.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FilmList(_ref){let{films,onDelete,onEdit}=_ref;const[selectedFilm,setSelectedFilm]=useState(null);const playVideo=film=>{if(!film.video||film.video===''){console.error('No video URL found for the film:',film.title);return;}setSelectedFilm({...film,videoUrl:"http://localhost:3000/uploads/".concat(film.video)});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"film-list",children:[films.map(film=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"film-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"film-thumbnail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:film.thumbnail||'placeholder.jpg',alt:"Still frame of ".concat(film.title)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"play-button",onClick:()=>playVideo(film),children:"Play"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rating",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Description: ",film.description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Rating: ",film.rating," stars"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDelete(film.id),children:"Delete"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onEdit(film),children:"Edit"})]})]},film.id)),selectedFilm&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"video-player",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{src:selectedFilm.videoUrl,controls:true,autoPlay:true,children:"Your browser does not support the video tag."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setSelectedFilm(null),children:"Close"})]})]});}export default FilmList;
